emails.subject: URGENT: Regulatory Headwinds — OmniCorp Deal
emails.preview: Alex, legal just flagged a potential antitrust inquiry in Brussels regarding the OmniCorp deal. We need to factor a 5% break fee into the model to cover our downside risk...

emails.subject: Validation of OmniCorp Cohort Data
emails.preview: My team finished the deep dive on OmniCorp's churn metrics. Net Dollar Retention is actually 118%, not 115% as reported in the CIM. The 12x ARR multiple is defensible given this stickiness...

emails.subject: LP Concern — Tech Exposure (Teacher's Fund)
emails.preview: The Teacher's Pension Fund is asking about our exposure to semiconductor volatility given the recent geopolitics. Can we prepare a one-pager on our hedging strategy before the quarterly call?...

emails.subject: Confidential: Debt Financing Terms — Project Blue Sky
emails.preview: Term sheet attached for the Project Blue Sky leverage package. Spreads have widened to SOFR + 450bps due to credit market tightening. This impacts our LBO model returns by ~150bps...

emails.subject: Vertex AI — Series B Term Sheet Signed
emails.preview: Great news. Vertex AI just closed their Series B led by Sequoia. Our stake is being marked up 140% from our entry valuation. This will significantly boost Fund III's Q3 IRR...

documents.title: Project_Blue_Sky_IC_Memo.pdf
documents.preview: Investment Committee Memo. Target: OmniCorp. Ask: $150M Equity. Valuation: $1.2B (12x ARR). Strategic Rationale: Market consolidation play with CloudNexus synergies...

documents.title: Fund_III_Q3_Performance.xlsx
documents.preview: Fund III Net IRR: 22.4%. TVPI: 1.8x. DPI: 0.4x. Top Performers: Vertex AI, HealthBridge. Watchlist: StreamLine Retail (-12% markup)...

documents.title: Due_Diligence_Red_Flag_Report.docx
documents.preview: KPMG Financial & Tax Due Diligence. Exec Summary: No material accounting irregularities found. Adjusted EBITDA for FY24 is $98M. IT audit pending...

documents.title: Global_Macro_Outlook_Q4.pptx
documents.preview: Soft Landing vs Recession. Base case: fed cuts rates by 25bps in Q4. Inflation stabilizing at 2.8%. Geopolitical risks remain elevated...

slack.message: Updated the LBO model with the SOFR + 450bps financing terms. IRR drops to 19.5% in the base case, but rises to 23% if we include the CloudNexus synergies.
Agenda for Monday is locked. We are doing a deep dive on Vertex AI's exit options. I want to see a comp analysis for a potential IPO vs Secondary Sale.
Just got off the phone with the Endowment. They are happy with the Vertex markup but want clarity on when we expect the next capital call.
